LEVEL 21
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 21
By Y.K.TAN on Sunday, May 12, 2002 - 02:33 am:

LEVEL 21

At the stage of this stage,you'll be falling down. After you've reached the ground,move right one step,and destroy that box on your right. After that,move all the way right to the wall,if a box blocks you,destroy it. Move three steps left,and facing left,create a box,to ensure that later if you enter the door way,it'll be easier,to stand on it. where is blocks the gap and don't let you fall off and erstart the process again. Move all the way right,and create boxes and climb up them,while destroying those boxes the jells stand on. After destroying two jells,create a box on the right side(nearer to the wall),and not in the same "ledge" where the jell stands on,and wait for the third jell to come,and destroy the box,and kill it. Climb up the wooden ledge. and at the leftenmost box,destroy it,and get the key and jump down to win the stage.
